alert.note: Alert for Freestone; Limestone; Navarro (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 10 at 6:20PM CDT until June 10 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM CDT FOR FREESTONE...NORTHEASTERN LIMESTONE AND SOUTHWESTERN NAVARRO COUNTIES... At 619 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Elkhart to 7 miles south of Fairfield Lake State Park to near Wortham, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...65 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Mexia, Teague, Fairfield, Wortham, Coolidge, Dawson, Angus, Lake Mexia, Fort Parker State Park, Navarro Mills Lake, Fairfield Lake State Park, Richland-Chambers Reservoir, Retreat, Tehuacana, Richland, Streetman, Kirvin, Fallon, Donie and Corbet. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...65 MPH
